summary: THE CRUISE AND AIR BAG LIGHT STAYED ON CONTINUOUSLY.  THE DEALER STATED THE CLOCK SPRING WAS THE PROBLEM AND THE SIGNALS FROM THE STEERING WHEEL WERE NOT BEING TRANSMITTED CORRECTLY.  THE CLOCK SPRING WAS REPLACED AT THE CONSUMERS EXPENSE.  THE CONSUMER REQUESTED A REFUND DUE TO RECALL #B24.  MR  SCC     *JB
